mapper.select: select a.*,c.old_price,c.now_price,c.food_name,c.file_list FROM nike_sign as a inner join nike_user as b on a.fk_user_id = b.id left join nike_food as c on a.fk_food_id = c.id where a.fk_user_id = #{id} ORDER BY a.gmt_create desc
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM nike_sign as a WHERE a.fk_food_id = #{foodId} and a.fk_user_id = #{userId}
